title: Ticket #4101: rename STARTD preemption stats to be consistent with SCHEDD stats
description:
The names for the new STARTD preemption stats are inconsistent with the naming convention used in SCHEDD stats. The prefix "Total" should be removed, and replaced with "Job". so that when the Recent prefix is added, the names are still sane. 

    TotalJobStarts -> JobStarts
    TotalPreemptions -> JobPreemptions
    TotalRankPreemptions -> JobRankPreemptions
    TotalUserPrioPreemptions -> JobUserPrioPreemptions
check_ins:
2013-Dec-18 10:56   Check-in [39044]: For 8.1.3, expand and include all changed attribute definitions; complete version history item and correct ticket number; alphabetize attributes. #4101 (By Karen Miller )
2013-Nov-27 14:00   Check-in [38874]: rename new STARTD preempt stats, TotalJobStarts becomes JobStarts, etc #4101 ===VersionHistory:Complete=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
